tosdr.case: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

title: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
quoteText:
I take all reasonable steps to protect information received from you from loss, misuse or unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration and/or destruction.
I have put in place appropriate physical, technical and administrative measures to safeguard and secure your information, and I make use of privacy-enhancing technologies such as encryption.
